venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Everything you read about the Law of Attraction will tell you the importance of releasing negative thoughts and emotions and shifting in some way to a better feeling place. 

There are many useful processes available to help you with this, and one of the best is EFT, the Emotional Freedom Technique.  And, it's so simple and easy, and quick to use!  You pretty much can't get it wrong.

With this technique, you tap on energy meridian points on your body while making releasing statements; and then the magic just happens! 

Tonight you'll get a chance to learn and practice the process.  Of course, there'll also be time to meet other like-minded folks.  We hope to also have some open-ended time for any questions and discussions you'd like to have.

Join us for a stimulating evening and leave feelin' "good, good, good,good vibrations"!

Please be considerate and honor your "yes" rsvp by either showing up or letting us know if your plans change by changing your rsvp. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support!  Thank you!

Can't wait to co-create with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Using EFT to Create More Allowing States
